00075     {
00076         // This calls serialize on the base class.
00077         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractOdeSystem>(*this);
00078         archive & mDt;
00079         archive & mSetVoltageDerivativeToZero;
00080         // archive & mVoltageIndex; - always set by constructor - called by concrete class
00081         // archive & mpOdeSolver; - always set by constructor - called by concrete class
00082         // archive & mpIntracellularStimulus; - always set by constructor - called by concrete class
00083     }
